name: some-eye-tracking-thing
description: Eye tracking application for assessment and evaluation purposes

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd server && npx prisma migrate reset

author: SomeEyeTrackingThing
